titles.title: Amnesty Bonuses Elimination Act
A bill to prohibit the issuance of social security numbers to individuals given deferred action under the President's immigration executive actions.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
3/16/2015--Introduced. Amnesty Bonuses Elimination Act
This bill amends the Social Security Act to prohibit the Commissioner of Social Security from issuing a Social Security account number to any alien granted deferred action pursuant to specified deferred action policies of the Secretary of Homeland Security.
